title: Catalog of all GW2 Items Currently in API

comments.author: Sariel V.7024
comments.body:
FrederickD.1269:

This is a catalog with faceted search of all the GW2 items currently in the API, not sure if anyone would be interested but it’s a neat way to navigate around through what there is.

https://app.salsify.com/catalogs/5cb0f831-1b10-407a-974e-bb0937fcda81/products

I’m interested. The API entry for items can be a cumbersome read.

comments.author: FrederickD.1269
